hints.content:
The first clock reads $\redD{10}{:}\blueD{42}$.



[[☃ image 1]]



[[☃ image 2]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute. The short, red hand points between the 10 and the 11. The long, blue hand points to the second tick mark after the 8. !
A number line labeled 10:30 to 11:30 with tick marks at every minute unit. The 11:00 tick mark is labeled. The tick mark for 10:42 is highlighted in blue and labeled. !

hints.content:
Now, let's find $27$ minutes after $\redD{10}{:}\blueD{42}$.



[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{\redD{10}{:}\blueD{42}} +{} &\goldE{8}\text{ minutes} = 10{:}50\\\\
10{:}50 +{} & \purpleD{10}\text{ minutes} = 11{:}00 \\\\
11{:}00 +{}&\greenD{9}\text{ minutes} = {\redD{11}{:}\blueD{09}}
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 10:30 to 11:30 with tick marks every 1 minute unit. A series of three arrows are shown moving left to right from the 10:42 tick mark to the 11:09 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 10:42  tick mark and ends at the 10:50 tick mark and is labeled plus 8. The second arrow starts at the 10:50  tick mark and ends at the 11:00 tick mark and is labeled plus 10. The third arrow starts at the 11:00 tick mark and ends at the 11:09 tick mark and is labeled plus 9. !

hints.content:
$\redD{11}{:}\blueD{09}$ is $27$ minutes after $\redD{10}{:}\blueD{42}$.



[[☃ image 1]]



Which clock shows $\redD{11}{:}\blueD{09}$?

options.alt: A number line labeled 10:30 to 11:30 with tick marks at every minute unit. The 11:00 tick mark is labeled. The tick mark for 10:42 is highlighted in blue and labeled. The tick mark for 11:09 is highlighted in blue and labeled. !
A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute. The short hand points between the 11 and 12. The long hand points to the fourth tick mark after the 1. !

question.content:
Look at the time on the following clock.



[[☃ image 1]]

**Which clock shows a time that is $27$ minutes later?**    

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute. The short hand points between the 10 and the 11. The long hand points to the second tick mark after the 8. !

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute. The short hand points to the 11. The long hand points to the fourth tick mark after the 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4d315d1632da625eb172cfdf455dc816d0b0cc1e)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute. The short hand points between the 10 and the 11. The long hand points to the fourth tick mark after the 1.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c8ab55c5be24b707646c01f9cebc472ab3206d50)
